attributes.action: Reward NHS employee 1 additional day off due keeping NHS Running during COVID
attributes.additional_details: I speak on behalf of all  NHS staff. The service providers deserve to be rewarded. For all their hard work commitment and sacrifices they have made. Such as working extra time leaving their families so services do not fail, sacrificing annual leave, so that  service continues to run. Without the commitment of our NHS employees the NHS would suffer. As a thank you and show of appreciation the Government  should grant 1 day extra leave either this year or next financial year.
attributes.background: I want the covid to give all NHS staff 1 extra day off annual leave. Due to Covid 19 and other covid variants, NHS staff have worked hard to keep the services running, despite the staff shortages lack of funding. The staff had ensured that patients get the best care despite these shortages.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The NHS is responsible for decisions about annual leave, not the UK Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
